pages.text: $(li)The Miner can only be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_mine)Illager Mines$(/l) extracting essential resources for them, mainly ores.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_nugget)Iron Nuggets$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Gold Nuggets$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l).
